ability.name: Fling Through Time
ability.flavor: You hurl the target through the annals of time, forcing them to witness every moment of their existence all at once.

metadata.flavor: You hurl the target through the annals of time, forcing them to witness every moment of their existence all at once.

effect.t1: 3 + P corruption damage; P < WEAK, weakened (save ends)
effect.t2: 5 + P corruption damage; the target is flung through time, and if P < AVERAGE, they are weakened (save ends)
effect.t3: 8 + P corruption damage; the target is flung through time, and if P < STRONG, they are weakened (save ends)

effects.effect: A target who is flung through time is removed from the encounter map until the end of their next turn, reappearing in their original space or the nearest unoccupied space.
You take 2d6 damage and permanently grow visibly older (the equivalent of 10 years for a human). If you obtain a tier 3 outcome on the power roll, you gain 2 clarity.
